mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SSO_CONFIG sso WHERE 1=1 AND SsoType = #{ssotype} AND DomainID = (SELECT NVL(MAX(DomainID), 0) FROM SSO_CONFIG WHERE Code = sso.Code AND DomainID = #{domainID})

SELECT oc.client_id AS "client_id" , oc.client_secret AS "client_secret" , oc.UserCode AS "UserCode" , oc.client_name AS "client_name" , oc.description AS "description" , oc.client_url AS "client_url" , oc.client_type AS "client_type" , oc.scope AS "scope" , oc.redirect_uri AS "redirect_uri" FROM oauth_client oc INNER JOIN sys_object_domain sod ON sod.DomainURL = oc.domainURL INNER JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup soubg ON soubg.UserCode = oc.UserCode AND soubg.JobType = 'Origin' WHERE soubg.UserCode =#{ur_code} AND ROWNUM = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM OAUTH_CLIENT WHERE 1=1 AND client_id IN (SELECT b.client_id FROM ( SELECT bc.client_id FROM OAUTH_CLIENT bc INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_DOMAIN sod ON sod.DomainURL = bc.domainURL INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER ur ON ur.UserCode = #{ur_code} INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP SOUBG ON SOUBG.UserCode = ur.UserCode WHERE 1=1 AND ur.UserCode = #{ur_code}) b)
